thread.section_title: Trident University Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trident University | trident.edu
thread.title: KST

author: KST
title: KST
text:
Trident is a great University! As a working adult with a young family, I for once donâ€™t feel I have to sacrifice quality for flexibility and appreciate the challenging yet manageable coursework Trident offers. The staff is really helpful and offers a lot of support to me when needed. Everyone is approachable and willing to take the time needed to ensure I am set up for success. All of my professors are committed to making sure I meet my learning objectives and progress in my coursework and overall program. The best part is being able to apply my learning in my job each and every day. It is applicable and has definitely enhanced my performance.
If you are a working adult in need your next degree, but are challenged time and other competing priorities, Trident is a great place for you. They are flexible, affordable and committed to your success!
